text: â€œBalia abaloondanga injila yomurumwa, Omurumwa ulamanya okhusoma nende okhuhandika tawe, owabalolanga yahandikwa Muitaurati nende mu Injili uwubachelelanga okhukhola amalayi nende okhubakania okhukhola amabii, nende akhubatiukhula emisiko nende eminyororo chiabali nibaboywa. Kho balia abamusuubila mana nibamuwa oluyali mana nibamuhabina, mana nibaloonda obulafu obweshibwa halala ninaye abo nibo balibura
